title: Nosferatu
description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

title: Nosferatu the Vampyre
description: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
description: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fianc√©e Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

title: Dracula
description: Transylvanian vampire Count Dracula bends a naive real estate agent to his will, then takes up residence at a London estate where he sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.

title: Dracula Untold
description: As his kingdom is being threatened by the Turks, young prince Vlad Tepes must become a monster feared by his own people in order to obtain the power needed to protect his own family, and the families of his kingdom.

title: Dracula
description: In 1897 Transylvania, the blood-drinking Count draws his plans against Victorian London.

title: Dracula
description: In 1913, the charming, seductive and sinister vampire Count Dracula travels to England in search of an immortal bride.

title: Horror of Dracula
description: Jonathan Harker rouses the ire of Count Dracula after he accepts a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses. Harker's friend, Dr. Van Helsing, then embarks on a hunt for the predatory villain when he targets Harker's loved ones.

title: Count Dracula
description: The vampire count leaves his Transylvanian home to wreak havoc across the world.

title: Dracula
description: Dracula is searching for a woman who looks like his long dead wife.

title: Van Helsing
description: The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.

title: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night
description: In the Iranian ghost-town Bad City, a place that reeks of death and loneliness, the townspeople are unaware they are being stalked by a lonesome vampire.
